name: 6-Week Shred Program
description: Complete workout program for engagement photo preparation

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.notes: Weeks 1-2: 5 reps, Weeks 3-4: 4 reps, Weeks 5-6: 3 reps

exercises.name: Bent-Over Row
exercises.notes: Pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Keep core tight, controlled movement

exercises.name: EMOM 12 minutes: Pull-ups / Push-ups
exercises.notes: Minute 1: Pull-ups x 8-12, Minute 2: Push-ups x 15-20. Alternate each minute.

exercises.name: AMRAP 8 minutes
exercises.notes: Dumbbell rows x 12 each arm, Incline dumbbell press x 15, Lateral raises x 20

exercises.name: Plank Hold
exercises.notes: Maintain straight line from head to toe

exercises.name: Dynamic Movement
exercises.notes: Prepare body for workout

exercises.name: EMOM 20 minutes: 4 exercises
exercises.notes: Min 1: Dumbbell thrusters x 12-15, Min 2: Renegade rows x 8-10 each arm, Min 3: Single-arm overhead carry + reverse lunge x 6 each side, Min 4: Dumbbell burpees x 8-12

exercises.name: AMRAP 5 minutes
exercises.notes: Dumbbell swings x 15, Push-ups x 10, Squat jumps x 10

exercises.name: Back Squat
exercises.notes: Same rep scheme as Monday

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Hip hinge movement, keep bar close to body

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
exercises.notes: Rear foot elevated on bench

exercises.name: EMOM 15 minutes
exercises.notes: Minutes 1-5: Goblet squats x 15, Minutes 6-10: Single-leg RDL x 8 each leg, Minutes 11-15: Jump squats x 12

exercises.name: AMRAP 6 minutes
exercises.notes: Walking lunges x 20 (10 each leg), Calf raises x 25, Wall sit x 30 seconds

exercises.name: Circuit 1 (4 rounds)
exercises.notes: 1. Dumbbell squat to press, 2. Single-arm row (alternate), 3. Reverse lunges with bicep curls, 4. Renegade rows, 5. Dumbbell deadlift to upright row, 6. Mountain climbers

exercises.name: Rest Period
exercises.notes: Recover between circuits

exercises.name: Circuit 2 (3 rounds)
exercises.notes: 1. Dumbbell Romanian deadlifts, 2. Push-up to T-rotation, 3. Goblet squats with pulse, 4. Single-arm overhead press (switch arms), 5. Dumbbell step-ups, 6. Plank with dumbbell pull-throughs

exercises.name: Farmer's Walk
exercises.notes: Use 50lb dumbbells or adjust weight as needed

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.notes: Focus on speed and power

exercises.name: Push Press
exercises.notes: Explosive overhead movement

exercises.name: Box Jumps or Jump Squats
exercises.notes: Explosive lower body power

exercises.name: AMRAP Round 1 (5 min)
exercises.notes: Burpees x 5, Kettlebell swings x 10, Mountain climbers x 20

exercises.name: AMRAP Round 2 (5 min)
exercises.notes: Thrusters x 8, Pull-ups x 6, Push-ups x 12

exercises.name: AMRAP Round 3 (5 min)
exercises.notes: Squat to calf raise x 15, Pike push-ups x 8, Plank to downward dog x 10

exercises.name: AMRAP Round 4 (5 min)
exercises.notes: Repeat Round 1: Burpees x 5, Kettlebell swings x 10, Mountain climbers x 20

exercises.name: Dynamic Warm-up
exercises.notes: Cat-cow stretches, World's greatest stretch, Hip circles and leg swings, Arm circles and shoulder rolls

exercises.name: Strength-Flexibility Flow
exercises.notes: Sun salutation A (5 rounds), Warrior sequence (30 sec holds), Triangle pose series, Twisted chair pose, Eagle pose balance, Low lunge with side stretch

exercises.name: Recovery/Restoration
exercises.notes: Pigeon pose (2 min each side), Seated spinal twist, Happy baby pose, Legs up the wall, Savasana

exercises.name: Complete Rest
exercises.notes: Focus on sleep, hydration, and meal prep for the week

exercises.name: Optional Cardio
exercises.notes: Light cardio if desired: walking, easy cycling, or swimming

exercises.name: Meal Prep
exercises.notes: Prepare healthy meals for the upcoming week
